title: Presentation
description: Oral or visual presentation demonstrating subject mastery and communication skills.

milestones.name: Read the assignment instructions
milestones.description: Understand timing, audience, assessment criteria, and required artefacts.

milestones.name: Read the assignment rubric
milestones.description: Highlight what high distinction responses include and plan to meet those standards.

milestones.name: Research your topic
milestones.description: Gather evidence, case studies, and visuals that support your key message.

milestones.name: Draft an outline of what you will cover
milestones.description: Sequence ideas logically from introduction to conclusion and allocate speaking time.

milestones.name: Structure your content
milestones.description: Build supporting materials such as notes, handouts, or demonstrations.

milestones.name: Design your slides
milestones.description: Create accessible visual aids that reinforce the narrative without overwhelming it.

milestones.name: Practice your presentation
milestones.description: Rehearse delivery, refine timing, and confirm technology works as expected.

milestones.name: Deliver presentation
milestones.description: Present confidently, respond to questions, and capture feedback for future growth.
